ygData.subject: Re: Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes.  For some reason, that s impossible to fathom, tinkering seems to be on the same level cap as Caster Research - namely, 5 * (Level - 15). I don t know if
ygData.messageBody:
Yes. For some reason, that's impossible to fathom, tinkering seems to
be on the same level cap as Caster Research - namely, 5 * (Level - 15).
I don't know if this is a bug or deliberate but we should petition
Verant and ask that the cap be removed so that Tinkering is on a par
with the other trade skills (Tailor, blacksmith, etc.)

Calbasil Psyrex of Ak'Anon (Bertoxx)
House of Silmindo


Brian Nelson wrote:

> I am a 29 gnome Wiz, I cannot seem to get my tinkering skill above
> 70, does anyone know why? I have spent so much money on tinkering now
> and my skill is 70, but even after I got to 70 skill I have made 30
> spyglasses and 24 cams, no skill gain. Is there some kind of level
> cap? Brillian Novaspire29 WizSolusek Ro
